DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the efficacy of using a pre-dive checklist to prevent the incidence of diving mishaps in recreational divers.
DOC.brief_title: Common Recreational Diving Practices: A Randomized Control Trial Using Pre-Dive Checklist
DOC.criteria: Over 18 years of age Having a valid Diver Certification Deemed fit by the Dive operator to dive on the day of participation Planning to dive on the day of participation Have basic knowledge of English Anyone not meeting all of the inclusion criteria A diver who did not answer the outcomes questionnaire was later excluded
